name: Guess The Dota 2 Heroes QUIZ APP
name_original: Guess The Dota 2 Heroes QUIZ APP
description:
Guess The Dota 2 Heroes QUIZ APP

Test your dota2 knowledge by this simple quiz.
Guess The Dota 2 Heroes is a simple quiz app that test your knowledge in knowing of your favorite dota 2 heroes.
• Earn coins: use for hints, reveal words and solve the problem.
• Earn Gems: to top the leader board.
